com.milk.objed
Class AutoUpdater

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.objed.AutoUpdater
public final class AutoUpdater
extends java.lang.Object

An AutoUpdater is used to cause a set of editors to be told to update themselves at a regular basis.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

Nested Class Summary
private  class AutoUpdater.UpdateRunnable
          This class is used as the Runnable which fires off all the update requests.
 
Field Summary
private  java.util.Vector myEditors
          the list of editors to update
private  int myFrequency
          the frequency (in msec) to update, or 0 to stop
private  boolean myIsScheduled
          true if the TimedRun is currently scheduled
private  int myLength
          the length of the editors list
private  TimedRun myTimedRun
          the TimedRun used to fire the update events
